#id=1
#text=I decided I really wanted to bake a cake so I hopped into the car and drove to the grocery store .
#id=2
#text=I bought flour , sugar , eggs , and some cocoa .
#id=3
#text=All the other ingredients I had at home already .
#id=4
#text=Once I got home I got out my big mixing bowl and measuring cups and spoons .
#id=5
#text=I pre-heated the oven to 400 degrees and started pouring ingredients into the mixing bowl .
#id=6
#text=After all the ingredients were mixed , I greased a cake pan and poured in the batter .
#id=7
#text=I put the pan in the oven and started mixing the ingredients for the frosting in a new bowl .
#id=8
#text=After baking for a while , I took the cake out and stuck in a toothpick to make sure the center was done .
#id=9
#text=I let the cake cool for a bit and then put the frosting on it .
#text=After frosting went on , I cut it into pieces and put one on a plate for myself and another for my friend .
